mapper.select: select cate_name from ai_cate where cate_no = #{no}

select cc.cate_no, cc.cate_name, nvl(dd.cnt, 0) as cnt from ai_cate cc,( select a.cate_no, a.cate_name, count(*) as cnt from ai_cate a, ai_board b where a.cate_no = b.cate_no group by a.cate_no, a.cate_name order by a.cate_no )dd where cc.cate_no = dd.cate_no(+) order by cc.cate_no

select rowIndex, cate_no, cate_name, NO, TITLE, USER_ID , HIT_CNT , RECM_CNT , CONTENT , REG_DATE, UPD_DATE, ( select count(*) as cnt from ai_reply where pno = a.no) as REP_CNT from( select rownum as rowIndex, a.cate_no, cate_name, NO , TITLE , USER_ID , HIT_CNT , RECM_CNT , CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(UPD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_DATE from ai_board a, ai_cate b where a.cate_no = b.cate_no and a.cate_no = #{cateNo} order by no desc )a where rowIndex between #{startIndex} and #{endIndex}
select count(*) as cnt from ai_board where cate_no =#{cateNo}

select a.cate_no, cate_name, NO , TITLE , USER_ID , HIT_CNT , RECM_CNT , CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(UPD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DATE, ( select count(*) as cnt from ai_reply where pno = a.no) as REP_CNT from ai_board a, ai_cate b where no = #{no} and a.cate_no = b.cate_no
mapper.update: update ai_board set hit_cnt = #{hitCnt} where no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into ai_board (no, title, user_id, recm_cnt, hit_cnt, content, REG_DATE, UPD_DATE, cate_no) values(#{no}, #{title}, 'fireguy', 0, 0, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB, javaType=String} , SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{cateNo})
mapper.update: update ai_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content, jdbcType=CLOB, javaType=String}, upd_date=sysdate where no=#{no} and cate_no=#{cateNo}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(NO),0)+1 AS NO FROM AI_REPLY WHERE PNO = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AI_REPLY (NO, PNO, CONTENT, WRITER, REG_DATE, UPD_DATE) VALUES (#{no}, #{pno}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB, javaType=String}, 'fireguy', sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT NO, PNO, CONTENT, WRITER, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(UPD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DATE FROM AI_REPLY WHERE PNO = #{pno}
mapper.delete: DELETE AI_REPLY WHERE PNO=#{pno} and NO=#{no}
